mapper.select: SELECT PROJECT_ID as projectId , PROJECT_NAME as projectName , PROJECT_START_DATE as projectStartDate , PROJECT_END_DATE as projectEndDate , PROJECT_STATUS as projectStatus , u.REAL_NAME as createdBy , CREATED_AT as createdAt , UPDATED_BY as updatedBy , UPDATED_AT as updatedAt FROM PROJECTS prj JOIN USERS u ON u.USER_ID = prj.CREATED_BY
